titles.title: Raising awareness and encouraging prevention of stalking by establishing January 2007 as "National Stalking Awareness Month".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

bill.summary:
1/11/2007--Introduced.
Urges national and community organizations, private businesses, and the media to promote, through National Stalking Awareness Month, awareness of the crime of stalking.
